title: Blood Lines Book 1: Ties That Bind
description: Set in the backdrop of a barren world full of the swords-and-sorcery, Bloodlines is the story of ambition, fear, vengeance and retribution. This is the story of Hamza, a lone ranger, who in search of his past comes face to face with a dark force that plans on shaking the very foundation of civilization.Bloodlines is a Dark Fantasy Comic by Mehran Khan.
author: Mehran Khan
